title: Microsoft has reportedly cut another 1,000 jobs
text:
Microsoft has reportedly cut another 1,000 jobs 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
After cutting 18,000 jobs last year, with a further 7,800 layoffs this year related to restructuring of its phone division, Microsoft is now...
